text: Raymond J. Sullivan Jr. (January 31, 1977 â€“ October 11, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Rhode Island House of Representatives from 2005 to 2011. He was born in Providence, Rhode Island. Sullivan died on October 11, 2021 in Providence at the age of 44. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Providence, Rhode Island Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
